channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Illegally parked cars on Kidbrooke square, 10th January
item.description:
There are multiple cars parked everyday on double yellow lines despite reminders from the building management to remove them. Please can this be resolved.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Glenside Grove, Kidbrooke
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Playground is full of litter, 10th January
item.description:
No bin in one bin Other bin not emptying Litter and fly tipping in play park
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lyham Road, Clapham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Corroding base of lamp post, 10th January
item.description:
The second lamp post in Corbylands road from Halfway Street out side number 25 is very corroded at the base . It may not be as bad as it looks ,but i think it should be looked at . thank you .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 37, Corbylands Road, Longlands, Sidcup, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping outside 52 Alexandra Drive, 10th January
item.description:
Some of this has been here about two months and has been reported by multiple people. Unclear why it hasn’t been picked up. Both garden waste and old cupboards etc.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 66, Alexandra Drive, West Norwood, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mound of general dumped waste, 10th January
item.description:
This mound of general waste has been dumped at the top of Trinity Street and BHS. The pile is growing and is happening each and every week. The council don’t seem interested in sorting this issue out!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 305, Trinity Street, The Borough, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damaged car left parked on road, 10th January
item.description:
Car with badly damaged near side rear wheel - it is clearly unroadworthy. Parked up for weeks now. This road has a history of damaged vehicles appearing for long periods.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Edward Road, Sundridge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
